mapper.sql: ss.storage_id, ss.storage_code, ss.storage_name, ss.`level`, ss.storage_desc, ss.capacity, ss.temperature, ss.unit, ss.storage_type, ss.warehouse_id, ss.warehouse_area_id, ss.working_area_id, ss.roadway, ss.row_no, ss.column_no, ss.level_no, ss.putaway_move_line_no, ss.picking_move_line_no, ss.stock_move_line_no, ss.if_stock_lock, ss.surplus_load, ss.surplus_volume, ss.surplus_can_put_salver, ss.`status`, ss.remark, ss.org_id, ss.create_user_id, ss.create_time, ss.modified_user_id, ss.modified_time, ss.is_delete, ss.option1, ss.option2, ss.option3
mapper.select: SELECT bs.storage_id as storageId, bs.roadway, bs.row_no as rowNo, bs.column_no as columnNo, bs.level_no as levelNo, bs.putaway_move_line_no as putawayMoveLineNo, IFNULL(bs.surplus_load,0) as surplusLoad, IFNULL(bs.surplus_volume,0) as surplusVolume, bs.surplus_can_put_salver as surplusCanPutSalver, IFNULL(bmt.volume,0) as volume, IFNULL(bmt.net_weight,0) as netWeight FROM base_storage_material bsm LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON bsm.storage_id = bs.storage_id LEFT JOIN base_material_tab bmt ON bsm.material_id = bmt.material_id WHERE bs.warehouse_id =#{warehouseId} AND bsm.material_id =#{materialId} and bs.storage_type=2

select bs.putaway_move_line_no From wms_inner_inventory wii LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON bs.storage_id = wii.storage_id where wii.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} and wii.material_id = #{materialId} order by wii.modified_time desc limit 1 and bs.storage_type=2
